author: stefano
msg: Added the new Transformer interface. This is the basic XSLT machinery that is _always_ in place like XML parsers.
XSLTProcessor now uses a transformer to provide its operation, but this is also required by the XSP engine.

author: stefano
msg: Added the ability to send HTTP errors instead of the classic Cocoon error page.
this is done to pass the hand to the web server and hide the
internal stacktrace to the untrusted users.

author: stefano
msg: Donald, Ricardo: please, look at the showstoppers!!!!

author: stefano
msg: For now you will find only a bunch of interfaces and some random utility classes
A _lot_ of reasoning has been put into this but I want this to
become the whiteboard for future development.
I consider Cocoon 1.x architecture-frozen, every change that
requires architecture changes is postponed into 2.x

author: stefano
msg: file Serializer.java was initially added on branch xml-cocoon2.
